parameters.name: maf
parameters.text: a character vector of the file path to the maf annotation result table tsv files.

parameters.name: rawfiles
parameters.text: a character vector of the raw data files, should be in mzpack data format!

extract_spectra.title: Workflow function for extract the reference spectrum

parameters.name: x
parameters.text: A numeric matrix or data.frame containing expression data. Rows represent features (genes/proteins), columns represent samples.

parameters.name: sampleinfo
parameters.text: A data.frame containing sample metadata. Must include: \itemize{ \item{sample_name: Character vector with sample identifiers} \item{sample_info: Factor or character vector with sample classification} \item{color: Character vector specifying display colors for samples} } Row names must match column names of the original expression matrix.

combine_sampleinfo.returns: A merged data.frame with: \itemize{ \item{First 3 columns: sample_name, class (from sample_info), color} \item{Subsequent columns: expression values from input matrix} } Note: The input matrix is transposed before merging (samples become rows).
combine_sampleinfo.title: Combine expression matrix with sample metadata This function performs row-wise merging of transposed expression data with sample metadata, requiring matching row names between the two inputs.
